name: .OPF File Extension
summary: Learn about .OPF files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An OPF file is a FlipBook specification file created by E-Book Systems FlipViewer. It contains XML-format data that defines and organizes a FlipBook's content.

content: FlipViewer is a content viewing and publishing application that allows users to create and save digital magazines, catalogs, and other forms of eBooks. The app saves these eBooks, known as FlipBooks, in the OEB Package Format (OPF). These packages consist of an OPF file and imported content files (such as images).
Alternatively, users can save FlipBooks in the .OPZ format. An OPZ file is a single, zipped file that includes a FlipBook's OPF file and all referenced content files.

instructions: You can open an OPF file with E-Book Systems FlipViewer and Mac FlipViewer. In FlipViewer, you can view the FlipBook an OPF file describes.
You can also open an OPF file with Microsoft Notepad (Windows), Apple TextEdit (Mac), or any other text editor, to view the XML data it contains.
